sys_script_include.description: Accepts sys user and returns manager name
sys_script_include.name: ClassGetManager

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_db7c3d9f97e11110a54377d71153af50
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.ClassGetManager</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Accepts sys user  and returns manager name</description><name>ClassGetManager</name><script><![CDATA[var ClassGetManager = Class.create();

ClassGetManager.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getManagerName: function() {

        var sysid = this.getParameter("sysparam_requestedFor");
        gs.addInfoMessage("sysid " + sysid);

        var managername = '';
        var empname = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        empname.addQuery('sys_id', sysid);
        empname.query();

        if (empname.next()) {
            gs.addInfoMessage("manager " + empname.manager);
            managername = empname.manager;
        }
        return managername.getDisplayValue();
    },
    type: ' ClassGetManager'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-31 16:55:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>db7c3d9f97e11110a54377d71153af50</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ClassGetManager</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_db7c3d9f97e11110a54377d71153af50</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-31 18:57:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
